messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: quiverfulls
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/7/2003 11:22:12 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yup, I ve seen that, too. There are also charities out there where people can donate money
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/7/2003 11:22:12 PM Eastern Standard Time,
mamabethuscg@... writes:

>
> I have seen quite a bit in my Christian circles about being "quiver-full"
> although I never realized (or was told) that there was actually a book about
> the subject.

Yup, I've seen that, too. There are also charities out there where people can
donate money to raise funds for men to get their vasectomies reversed, so
they can get back to work making more babies.
Amy Kagey
Usborne Books make great holiday gifts!
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=1684902">my Usborne Books website!</A>
